name: arKda
description:
arKda is a spiritual successor to the arcade genre, an endless top-down multidirectional shooter inspired by games such as Geometry Wars and Hotline Miami.

If wave-based gameplay, powerful VFX and 8 unique weapon choices are something that pique your interest, give arKda a try.

Keep in mind that even though the game is complete, it will still get updated with new content, such as new guns, weapon types, arenas, you name it.

Controls:

  • Movement: mouse
  • Fire: mouse click (configurable)
  • Switch weapon: scroll wheel (configurable)
